com.stripe.android

Class IssuingCardPinService

  • com.stripe.android.IssuingCardPinService

  • public class IssuingCardPinService

    Methods for retrieval / update of a Stripe Issuing card

    • Field Detail

      • Companion

        public static com.stripe.android.IssuingCardPinService.Companion Companion

    • Method Detail

      • retrievePin

        public void retrievePin(@NotNull
                        java.lang.String cardId,
                        @NotNull
                        java.lang.String verificationId,
                        @NotNull
                        java.lang.String userOneTimeCode,
                        @NotNull
                        com.stripe.android.IssuingCardPinService.IssuingCardPinRetrievalListener listener)

        Retrieves a PIN for a given card

        Parameters:
        cardId - the ID of the card (looks like ic_abcdef1234)
        verificationId - the ID of the verification that was sent to the cardholder(typically server-side, through /v1/issuing/verifications)
        userOneTimeCode - the one-time code that was sent to the cardholder through sms or email
        listener - a listener for either the PIN, or any error that can occur

      • updatePin

        public void updatePin(@NotNull
                      java.lang.String cardId,
                      @NotNull
                      java.lang.String newPin,
                      @NotNull
                      java.lang.String verificationId,
                      @NotNull
                      java.lang.String userOneTimeCode,
                      @NotNull
                      com.stripe.android.IssuingCardPinService.IssuingCardPinUpdateListener listener)

        Retrieves a PIN for a given card

        Parameters:
        cardId - the ID of the card (looks like ic_abcdef1234)
        newPin - the new desired PIN
        verificationId - the ID of the verification that was sent to the cardholder(typically server-side, through /v1/issuing/verifications)
        userOneTimeCode - the one-time code that was sent to the cardholder through sms or email
        listener - a listener for either the PIN, or any error that can occur
